job.title: Cloud Engineer - Azure/Microsoft 365
job.description:
If you are a Cloud Engineer with experience, please read on!
We are a fun organization that is moving our entire Data Center to Azure within a year, we will be 100% in the cloud. To make this happen we are looking for a Cloud Engineer as part of our new Cloud team!
What You Will Be Doing
Support and contribute to a cloud strategy
Manage the technical configuration and governance for the environment
Manage the Office 365 tenant
Work closely with infrastructure teams to ensure connectivity and resource availability
Partner with development team to support DevOps methodology
Support Application owners to ensure best practices in SAAS deployments
Provide guidance to operations and support teams to ensure proper operating procedures are in place for monitoring and management
What You Need for this Position
3+ years of IT Infrastructure experience
1+ years in cloud technologies, with a particular focus in Azure
Knowledge of Microsoft 365
Pluses
Certifications in Azure or Microsoft 365
Knowledge of Windows, Linux, Networking
Experience with DevOps methodology and use of Infrastructure as Code (ARM templates, Terraform, Ansible)
What's In It for You
We offer the opportunity to be on the ground floor our our biggest infrastructure initiative yet!
Local Candidates ONLY as we will have a Hybrid work week.
So, if you are a Cloud Engineer with experience, please apply today!
Email Your Resume In Word To
Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:
Rhona.Kannon@CyberCoders.com
Please do NOT change the email subject line in any way. You must keep the JobID: linkedin : RK3-1647513 -- in the email subject line for your application to be considered.***
Rhona Kannon - Principal Director - CyberCoders
Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.
CyberCoders, Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer
All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.
Your Right to Work
- In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
